name: Particle Simulation
description:
This is a learning project for me stepping in to compute shaders

Before making this I tried flocking behavior but there were no compute-shaders involved because of that number of objects was limited 

I have tried compute shaders before but never made a product for use like this!

I hope you guys have fun playing this sim

Still exploring Compute shaders in my free time.....

As i am dumb i didn't use the unities particle system here :{P........ X{D
